thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zix Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.08

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zix Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.08
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Zix Corp:
* ZIX REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $67.5 MILLION TO $69 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $16.6 MILLION TO $16.8 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 8 PERCENT TO $16.8 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32
* SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.08
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.17 TO $0.19 * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.04 TO $0.05 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.08
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.24 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
